page.title: 04CUSTOMS
page.content: The Stamford Festival is held in the first week in July. It began in 1979 and every year a festival queen is chosen. This year forty floats will take part in the grand parade led by the queen. There is also a fancy dress parade for children. In Barn Hill they have a flea market where they sell 'Brick a Brack' books etc.There will be a half marathon with over a thousand runners taking part. Music and Drama events this year include items by St.Gilberts School and Fane School, the cider honey folk group, Stamford Pantomime Players, Stamford Town Band and stamford chamber orchestra is also playing. Also in the festival are sporting events like Cricket, Darts, Billiards and Football.
